snippet: A man was arrested at Los Angeles International Airport after a smoke grenade, a gas mask, leg irons, body bags, knives and other weapons were found in luggage.
abstract: Yongda Huang Harris is arrested at Los Angeles International Airport on suspicion of transporting hazardous materials en route from Japan to Boston.
lead_paragraph: A man was arrested at Los Angeles International Airport after a smoke grenade, a gas mask, leg irons, body bags, knives and other weapons were found in luggage.
